original_text: In appearance the locusts were like horses prepared for battle: on their heads were what looked like crowns of gold; their faces were like human faces,
korean_text: 황충들의 모양은 전쟁을 위하여 준비한 말들 같고 그 머리에 금 같은 관 비슷한 것을 썼으며 그 얼굴은 사람의 얼굴 같고

sentences.original_text: In appearance the locusts were like horses prepared for battle:
sentences.korean_translation: 외모상으로 그 메뚜기들은 전투를 위해 준비된 말들과 같았으며:

sentences.original_text: on their heads were what looked like crowns of gold;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 머리에는 금관처럼 보이는 것이 있었고;

sentences.original_text: their faces were like human faces,
